featured.text: We eat polluted dairy products and meat and take the dioxin into our bodies, where it is stored in our fat for years and builds up over time.

definition.zh_def: 乳製品，指由牛奶或其他乳類製成的食品。
definition.en_def: Food products made from milk, such as cheese, butter, and yogurt.
definition.example: She enjoys eating dairy products like cheese and yogurt.
